name: CSS for Cosmic Panda experiment re-creation
description: CSS for my Re-creation of TestTube Cosmic Panda experiment. Is No longer required for https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/7962 and is mainly used by me for creating the style.
additional_info: This works with my script https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/7962 to re-create cosmic panda watch page. THIS IS NO LONGER NEEDED TO USE IT!Mainly used for me creating the CSS, but can also be used if you want to make a custom userstyle for my script. (disable useRemoteCss)
